meta.label: Get endpoint list
meta.description: Get a detailed list of protected endpoints

params.name: TMV1 Filter
params.label: Filter for retrieving a subset of the endpoint information list.
params.description: Example: not (osName eq 'Windows') and eppAgentAntiMalwareScans eq 'enabled'. Check https://automation.trendmicro.com/xdr/api-v3#tag/Endpoint-Security/paths/~1v3.0~1endpointSecurity~1endpoints/get for filter syntax.
